Container.Name: Baikal
Container.Description: Baïkal lets you synchronize your calendars and address books over CalDAV and CardDAV.[br]Baïkal implements the IETF standards for centralized calendar and address book collections and is compatible with a large set of applications[br][b]IMPORTANT :- YOU MUST CHANGE THE HOST PORT BELOW[/b][br] ALSO SELECT SQLITE AS DATABASE TYPE (DEFAULT)
